A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I put this one in the bottom 3 or 4 of the 9 movie series.  I felt the middle 3rd of the movie was almost boring\, the fact that one character said she loved another character before she died bit hardly knew the character was overplayed.  Mark Hamil was disappointing as an actor as he over acted\, the incredible writing for his character was wonderful.   It was the writing and story made his conclusion meaningful and memorable.
